entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
